author: giffels
body:
Hi Diego,

as already discussed after the release planning meeting, could you please include the changes to WMCore Lexicon.py in the next deployment of dbs3/dbs3-migration on cmsweb-testbed. It fixes a input validation bug of some logical_file_names. 

Thanks a lot,
Manuel
title: comp.pre slc5_amd64_gcc461 dbs3 dbs3-migration
